_source.text: 2nd - Art Official: I still think this colt is better than Badlands Nitro; and with a post advantage, perhaps he can fill out the ex.

text: 2nd - Art Official: I still think this colt **is** **better** **than** **Badlands** Nitro; and with a post advantage, perhaps he can fill out the ex.

_source.text: A friend of mine recently returned from NYC and she said the hop-on/hop-off buses were fantastic and much better than the subway where you can't see anything so I think we will probably do that in combination with the New York City Pass.

text: and much **better** **than** the **subway** where you can't see anything so I think we will probably do that in combination with the New York City Pass.
A friend of mine recently returned from NYC and she said the hop-on/hop-off buses were **fantastic**

_source.text: A fantastic debut novel, Ms. Elliott, and much better than I had expected.

text: A **fantastic** debut novel, Ms. **Elliott**, and much **better** **than** I had expected.
